features: 3-Level Adjustable Touch Fill Light: Built-in high-quality fill light can be controlled by the touch switch at the bottom of the webcam. 3 brightness levels at low, medium and high to adjust the fill light and achieve ideal vividness in a dim lighting environment. Besides, a webcam with light will give us a favorable calibration of adequate ambient lighting conditions

FHD 1080p Webcam with Fixed Focus: The streaming webcam comes with 1080p Full HD, up to high definition 1920 x 1080p resolution at 30fps. Compared with a 720p webcam, this 1080p web camera can get a clearer video experience at fixed distances. The fixed focus HD webcam provides more consistent image quality. Perfect for Gaming, Streaming, Recording, Conferencing, Video Calling, Online Teaching, Zoom, Teams, Skype, OBS, Twitch, Facebook, YouTube.

2 Built-in Noise-Cancelling Microphones: This pc webcam has 2 built-in omnidirectional microphones applying with voice intelligent noise reduction processing, picking up our voice within 5-10m and filtering out background noise for barrier-free communication, which enables us to enjoy clearer voice for smoother conversations

Flexible Web Camera and Tripod Stand: papalook streamcam has 75° narrow-angle lens, 90° vertically up and down base, and 360° horizontally rotating base, we can adjust the angle of the web camera at will when we are video recording. Also, we can place the webcam anywhere we want with the included adjustable tripod stand and 6.5ft long USB cable

USB Plug-n-Play and Wide Compatibility: The webcam with microphone for desktop supports USB plug and play, easy to use, no other driver or software is required. The web camera also supports live streaming on social gaming & entertainment sites, such as Twitch, Skype, Youtube, Xsplit, Mixe, Vlogging, and is universally compatible with Windows XP/7/8/10/11, Mac OS, Linux, Chrome OS, Ubuntu Version

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Camera! (You must be techy)
reviews.reviewText: I was hesitant at buying this camera, at first, because of the reviews, but I chose to do so anyway. Some of the complaints say that the camera doesn't work when you plug it in. Well, duh, no camera does until the software is downloaded and the window opens that actually shows video (like Zoom, skype etc)!The second complaint I seen was that the picture quality was blurry. Once the software is downloaded, there is an area that resembles an stereo equalizer where you can customize the brightness, contrast, clarity, hue, etc. to create the perfect picture that you want. This same area also controls video recording and picture capturing.There is also another software that comes with the camera for uploading and sharing.The reason I say that you must be techy is because you have to take time to read the manual that is provided to know what website to go to, to set up your camera properly. This camera has way more features than I expected, especially the video record. So far I love it!(I also think it is unfair to give low reviews when the person is the problem and not the product).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works as it should
reviews.reviewText: Has good picture, easy to set up. Great product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great amateur camera for webcamming
reviews.reviewText: Camera works great! Love the ring light feature, it is very bright so it works perfect in all types of settings. Obvious it's a small light so it can only do so much with lighting. I've seen some reviews complaining that it's not bright enough in a pitch dark room & I don't think it's meant to be. It's small but bright enough for you to be visible on camera.I'm giving this 4 out of 5 stars because as other people have commented, there is a very slight wiring high pitch noise that you can hear on video playback. I mainly use this camera for work meetings on Zoom & my coworkers have told me the video quality is great and they can see me clearly but not sure if the noise is heard when you're using the cam live. My niece used my camera to record a project for her music class, and when playing back the video you can clearly hear the high pitch noise. It's minimal but for someone like me who notices the small details it definitely bothered me and was not happy about the video playback quality.Other than that the camera is great, has a long cord giving you enough length to mount the camera wherever you'd like. The grip is easy to apply to any monitor or laptop screen but it does take some time getting used to it. Overall I recommend for teens or for adults who plan to use this just for webcamming. If you're looking for high end quality video playback, look somewhere else.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works great light is bright as expected
reviews.reviewText: The sturdiness of the web cam gets a 10/10 quality is great

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is 11/10 rating
reviews.reviewText: This web camera - it has completely exceeded my expectations! The image quality is outstanding, providing crisp and clear visuals. The colors are vibrant, and the auto-focus feature works seamlessly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: A little disappointed, picture is a bit out of focus but was easy to set up and use. Will attempt to adjust and post an update. Update: Be aware that this camera has a fixed focus. Anything outside of that focus range is blurry. NOT good for video taping anything moving or out of the normal 16 inch range.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great camera for work meetings. The one on my laptop was subpar (dell) so I got this and couldn’t be happier. Easy to install and use and the ring light is a nice bonus!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars So many good reviews...I must have gotten a bad camera
reviews.reviewText: Bought this to do online assessments for my college courses. Half way thru my assessment it malfunctioned and would not come back on. Have to order a new camera and retake my assessment plus pay for the retake!!! Frustrating. I tried it multiple times after and the same thing would work for 5 or 20 minutes then shut down blank screen and nothing... very disappointing I really wanted this to work cuz I didn't want to spend a ton of money on a camera but should have realized that it was worth investing in a reliable camera. Glad it's worked for other ppl

reviews.reviewTitle: estupenda con luz del día, malísima con luz artificial. NO LA RECOMIENDO.
reviews.reviewText: La compré para mis clases en línea. En la tarde y mañana se ve genial, la imagen es super HD, pero para mis clases de la noche se ve super mal. Se ve como unas rayas que suben y bajan todo el tiempo. Esto debido a la luz artificial (focos). Me parece una super desventaja ya que se ve de mala calidad ,corriente y es lo suficientemente cara para que sea así. Es súper fácil de instalar, es china y literalmente la conectas y ya es todo.
Bonne caméras simple et de bonne qualité
Its the best webcam ever for me.

Exactly what i needed. No distracting auto-focus ; helpful for zoom meetings presentations. Havent tried the mic on the camera but the image quality is excellent. The ring light is a decent light and has three intensities but beware if you wear glasses. You will see in your glasses a bright spot of light. I personnally dont use it. Very satisfied with the image quality. It can easily mount on lots of types of monitors and also the conventional tripod screw mount.
